speaker: Agent
text: Hello, is this Mr. Thompson? This is Sarah calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is him. I'm doing fine, thank you.

speaker: Agent
text: I'm glad to hear that. I'm reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you confirm your current address for me as well?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your details. I see a balance of $450 on your account. How would you like to handle this?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay part of it today, maybe $200.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. Would you like to pay that by credit card or debit card?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! Please provide your card number when you’re ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Thompson. Your payment is being processed. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that will be all. Thanks for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Thank you for your payment. Have a great day.
